## Key Features

### âš¡ Performance Optimizations
- **Caching**: pip and npm dependencies cached
- **Parallelization**: Backend and frontend jobs run simultaneously
- **Concurrency Control**: Cancels outdated runs
- **Matrix Testing**: Multiple versions tested in parallel

### ğŸ”’ Security Features
- **CodeQL**: Advanced semantic analysis
- **Dependency Scanning**: Automated vulnerability detection
- **Minimal Permissions**: GITHUB_TOKEN restricted to necessary access
- **Regular Audits**: Weekly security scans

### ğŸ¯ Quality Gates
All PRs must pass:
1. Code formatting (black, ESLint)
2. Import sorting (isort)
3. Linting (flake8)
4. Type checking (TypeScript)
5. Unit tests (Django)
6. Build verification (Next.js)
7. Integration tests
8. Security scans

### ğŸ“Š Monitoring
- CI status badges on README
- Weekly dependency reports
- Security scan results
- Build time tracking

| Job | Typical Duration |
|-----|------------------|
| Backend Lint & Test | 1-2 minutes |
| Frontend Lint & Build | 2-3 minutes |

| CodeQL Analysis | 3-5 minutes |

## Success Criteria

âœ… All matrix tests pass
âœ… No linting errors
âœ… No type errors
âœ… All unit tests pass
âœ… Build succeeds
âœ… Integration tests pass
âœ… No security vulnerabilities
âœ… No high-severity dependency issues
